          use IdentityAPI.setUserMemberships(String, Collection) instead with memberships obtained with IdentityAPI.getMembershipForRoleAndGroup(String, String) and the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME

          use IdentityAPI.setUserMemberships(String, Collection) instead with memberships obtained with IdentityAPI.getMembershipForRoleAndGroup(String, String) and the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME

          use IdentityAPI.updateRoleByUUID(String, String, String, String) instead

org.ow2.bonita.facade.IdentityAPI.updateUser(String, String, String, String, String, String)
          use IdentityAPI.updateUserByUUID(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Map) to update the user's info and use IdentityAPI.updateUserPassword(String, String) to change the user's password.
